name: Unnamed gcgj1806 game
description:
Currently unnamed game made in about two and half days. Due time constraints all effects are missing and game is not as impressive without them. Its however quite playable.

Destroy all Ice golems before they snuff out your flame!

Controls (for keyboard or PS gamepad):

  • Move - Arrows / left stick
  • Move camera - Right stick
  • Attack - Z / Square
  • Block - C / Circle
  • Dash - X
  • Cooldown - V / Triangle
  • Menu - Enter / Start

Source available under MIT license from https://github.com/ville2304/gcgj1806
